Welcome to Namma Metro

BangaloreMetroRailCorporationLimited

(BMRCL),ajoint ventureofGovernment

ofIndiaand Government ofKarnatakais a

SpecialPurposeVehicleentrusted withthe

responsibilityofimplementationof

BangaloreMetroRailProject.

BangaloreMetro,christened as "Namma

Metro",not onlyadds tothebeautyof

Bengaluruskyline,but immenselyadds to

thecomfort leveloftravel.Besides this,

NammaMetrois amajorenvironment

friendlyadditiontotheBengaluruCityas

it significantlycontributes tothereduction

ofcarbonemissions.
